content.rendered:
Dainfern, Fourways

480 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 34m² to 83m².

R6,900pm – R13,800pm

Occupation from 1 June 2025

EXPLORE ESTATE

Olifantsfontein, Midrand

440 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 34m² to 83m².

R6,800pm – R12,500pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,800 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 32m² to 83m².

R6,900pm – R13,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,250 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3, and 4-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 38m² to 132m².

R7,000pm – R18,100pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Auckland Park

800 Luxurious student apartments with
numerous lifestyle facilities.

All rooms have private bathrooms
with weekly cleaning services.

R5,900pm – R8,650pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Somerset West, Cape Town

440 Lifestyle apartments located on
Copacabana Boulevard in Somerset West.

1, 2, 3-bedroom modern apartments
ranging from 32m² to 80m².

R7,100pm – R15,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Fairland, Northcliff

1,256 Apartments, located adjacent
to MTN’s head office in 14th Avenue.

1, 2, 3-bedroom modern apartments
ranging from 32m² to 80m².

R6,800pm – R13,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Riversands, Fourways

1,960 Apartments centred around
a central park area with outdoor facilities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom spacious apartments
ranging from 33m² to 74m².

R5,800pm – R11,200pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Crowthorne, Midrand

150 Well-appointed apartments with
schools, tight security and free activities.

1, 2, 3, 4-bedroom luxury apartments ranging from 48m² to 128m².

R8,300pm – R17,900pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Carlswald, Midrand

491 Well-appointed apartments with
schools, tight security and free activities.

1, 2, 3, 4-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 53m² to 175m².

R8,900pm – R21,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Crowthorne, Midrand

216 Exclusive apartments in an
award-winning environment.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments ranging from 42m² to 108m².

R7,900pm – R15,600pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Olifantsfontein, Midrand

270 Apartments, conveniently located
on Olifantsfontein Road in Midrand.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 30m² to 76m².

R6,800pm – R11,300pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

The Hills, Pretoria East

89 Luxury apartments located inside
The Hills Game Reserve Estate.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxurious apartments
ranging from 50m² to 116m².

R9,300pm – R17,600pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Waterfall Area

34 Freestanding homes located
in the heart of the Waterfall Area.

5 bedroom riverside houses with
an average size of 415m² each.

R46,100pm – R52,800pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Waterfall Area

190 Freestanding homes located
on the apex of the Waterfall Area.

3 and 4 bedroom houses ranging
from 310m² to 401m².

R37,100pm – R51,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Waterfall Area

72 Freestanding homes forming part
of the Waterfall Area community.

3 bedroom houses ranging
from 195m² to 270m².

R27,800pm – R34,500pm

EXPLORE ESTATE
